name: pnp-list-formatting-group-header-user-picture
title: Display a User's Photo in Group Header
shortDescription: This is a sample of customizing the group header when grouping by user column. Display the user's picture as well as the user's name in the group header.
longDescription: This is a sample of customizing the group header when grouping by user column. Display the user's picture as well as the user's name in the group header.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
